metadata.title: CVE-2024-3862 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The MarkStack assignment operator, part of the JavaScript engine, couldaccess uninitialized memory if it were used in a self-assignment. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 125.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
